channel.title: We Said What We Said With Rickey and Denzel
channel.description: Every week, join longtime besties Rickey Thompson and Denzel Dion as they dish on EVERYTHING THAT MATTERS. Pop culture! Sex! Partying! Struggle! Love! Music! Friendship! We Said What We Said is a show with bold advice, hot takes, and risqué storytelling.

image.title: We Said What We Said With Rickey and Denzel

item.title: Don't Talk Sh*t About Your Friend
item.description: Rickey and Denzel get honest and share the ups and downs of their 8-year friendship, including old (and current) fights, how they work together and remain friends, and their do's and don'ts of friendship.

item.title: The MOMENT Victoria Monét
item.description: Fan and stan Denzel and Rickey welcome the MOMENT Victoria Monét to the pod! Victoria gets into her creative process (hint: weed is involved), the girls plan their Malibu staycation, and Rickey recites Victoria's lyrics like a true fangirl.

item.title: It's the Bad B*tch Justine Skye
item.description: Artist Justine Skye joins the girls this week to talk being independent, her BUDGET music videos, and her days as THAT GIRL on Tumblr. Plus, did Rickey and Denzel record their own single?

item.title: Our Fans' Crazy Stories
item.description: Rickey and Denzel are handing the mics to the girls! It's time to answer YOUR questions and share YOUR crazy stories. How can I make it as a black influencer? The girls have answers! Sex with a teacher's assistant? Sex with a COUSIN?! It's all on today's episode of We Said What We Said!

item.title: Fat Vs. Skinny
item.description: Rickey and Denzel finally settle their long-standing debate: Who has it worse? A big girl or a skinny bitch? The girls divulge how they were bullied for being fat and skinny in school and how their size affects their lives now. Who do you think is right?

item.title: The REAL OG's
item.description: Rickey and Denzel bring on social media OG's Enya Umanzor (@enyaumanzor) and Drew Phillips (@drewphillips09) to talk about the crazy days of Finsta, getting a TikTok degree, and why we (sometimes) need to bring back bullying!

item.title: Dughana!
item.description: Rickey and Denzel are taking you on a journey, from Dubai all the way to Ghana! The girls share their hot takes on these travel destinations, along with their international party stories, travel mishaps, and shopping faux pas.

item.title: Paris Fashion Week
item.description: Paris Fashion Week was so much more than clothing for these girls! Rickey and Denzel lived on this trip, saying "yes" to rendezvous, paparazzi, and Paris pu$$.

item.title: No Peak for These B*tches
item.description: The girls are back for season 3, but this time the cameras are rolling! Rickey and Denzel know what they want and what they won't accept in 2022. They dish on Rickey's B-Day weekend, recent rendezvous, and their relationship fantasies.

item.title: Season 3 Premieres February 22
item.description: Season 3 is coming your way in just one week, and the girls are camera ready! That's because this season you won't just be listening to Rickey and Denzel. You can now WATCH them and their guests get real and dish on all things gossip, sex, and relationships.

item.title: Unpopular Opinions
item.description: Status quo be damned! This week the duo, never afraid to say what they say, bring their unpopular opinions on a myriad of topics including: the music of Azealia Banks, veganism, open relationships, baby hairs, bullies and more! Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices

item.title: Horror Stories
item.description: Join Trickey and Deadzel for a spooky episode about all things Halloween. Favorite scary movies! The supernatural! Costumes! Listen if you dare. Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices

item.title: Blackfishing or Catfishing?
item.description: The real Rickey and Denzel have logged on! This week is a look at different types of catfishing, the modern phenomenon of people pretending to be someone else online. Together, they share experiences being catfished and what to watch out for. Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices

item.title: Rickey and Denzel’s European Vacation
item.description: Fresh from holiday, the international duo has much to report about. From London to Barcelona and back again, Rickey and Denzel share their accounts of the nightlife, the drama, the beautiful strangers and more! Plus, a special edition of What's Your Jam this week: Victoria Monét’s “Coastin'” (which just happens to feature in the music video as co-lead THE Rickey Thompson!) Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices

item.title: Our New Eras
item.description: Join your trusty glow up guides, Rickey and Denzel, for a discussion of how self-improvement has played a role in each of their lives. Together they explore their personal journeys and share advice on what they’ve learned along the way. Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices

item.title: Las Vegas
item.description: What happened in Vegas? This week Rickey and Denzel tell the tale of their trip to Sin City and how it became one of the most epic hot mess of a weekend EVER. Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices

item.title: Music Evolution
item.description: Turn it up! Resident culture connoisseurs, Rickey and Denzel take a deep dive into all the best (and worst) music that matters. From pop to R&B to dance, together they discuss their favorite eras, standout artists, and share first concert experiences. Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices

item.title: Knowing Our Worth
item.description: Therapy is now in session because this week is all about knowing your worth! Rickey and Denzel explore what self-empowerment means to them and why it's so important to value, respect, and honor yourself. Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices

item.title: City Girl Summer
item.description: Get the lifestyle you deserve! This informative guide from Rickey and Denzel will help YOU graduate from having a Hot Girl Summer to a City Girl Summer™. Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices

item.title: Style Evolution
item.description: Today (like everyday) it’s ALL about fashion! Join Rickey and Denzel for a look back at how their personal styles have evolved over the years. And what’s next! Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices

item.title: Drunk Stories
item.description: Shots! Shots! Shots! This week Rickey and Denzel share some of their tipsiest tales and the lessons they’ve learned along the way. Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices

item.title: TikTok Kids Are Cute
item.description: The talented Rickey and Denzel are back for a brand new season! And to kick things off, the podcast hosts, actors, fashion icons, and social media sensations must ask but one simple question: “why haven’t WE made it yet?” Tired of the BS, they reflect on influencers in the age of TikTok, going on audition after audition, the empty promises, and all the other trials and tribulations with making it. Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices

item.title: Season 2 Premieres August 17th
item.description: Season 2 of We Said What We Said is here! Listen to a preview of conversations coming your way. Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices

item.title: I Know You Want Me
item.description: It’s the finale and the question du jour is: have Rickey and Denzel ever dated, or would they? Friendship, situtionships--Join the guys for one final epic play date! Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices

item.title: Who’s Our Jam? ft. Rico Nasty
item.description: The incomparable Rico Nasty! This week the glow up: an in-depth conversation with Rickey and Denzel’s favorite punk rap it girl. Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices

item.title: Influencing Influencers
item.description: Rickey and Denzel have been in the influencer game long enough to notice a few things: if you're young, if you're cute, if you're caucasian--talented or not--you're at advantage. This week, the guys talk about the grind: how they built and marketed their talent, how they maintain it, what their lives are really like despite what they post to entertain, and what comes next as they and their careers evolve. Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices

item.title: Bodies At Werk
item.description: Happy and healthy as they are, this week Rickey and Denzel share the ups and downs of their journeys to acceptance of their bodies at various sizes and stages in their lives, plus, what it means for them to embrace and embody body positive thinking.  Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices

item.title: Grown People Sex Pt. II
item.description: Spitting, spanking, hot wax, and nipple play, Rickey and Denzel divulge more of their kinky, freaky sexual fantasies and desires. You love to hear it!  Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices

item.title: Are We Even Real Friends?
item.description: Well, that depends who you ask. This episode, shots fired! Rickey and Denzel get personal like you’ve never heard before about their perfectly imperfect friendship: Rickey’s emotional needs versus Denzel’s emotional unavailability, Rickey’s loose use of the term “best friend,” and that one time Denzel needed a “break” and blocked Rickey altogether.  Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices

item.title: Shots, Stories and No Shame
item.description: This week, Rickey and Denzel spill about their drunkest, messiest, most embarrassing moments, more wild hookups, plus a cautionary tale about being too trusting with a fart... Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices

item.title: Situationships Pt. !!
item.description: They said what they said the first time around, but evidently, Rickey and Denzel didn’t say enough. This week the guys go even deeper on lies, love, and relationship lessons learned as Rickey prepares to turn 25 and twentyFINE, a birthday milestone! Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices

item.title: Manifest That Ish!
item.description: It’s a fresh new year, resolutions are set, and today, to close out Capricorn season, Rickey and Denzel turn dreams into reality with a little help from Denzel’s big brother, Bear. This week, We Said What We Said about the power of manifestation. Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices

item.title: 2021, We See You Girl!
item.description: Rested and resolved, Rickey and Denzel are back from winter vacation and ready to reveal resolution successes and failures of years past, plus their newly set intentions for the year ahead.  Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices

item.title: 2020 Recap
item.description: In a year like no other, Rickey and Denzel give you a 2020 recap like only they can! Counting their blessings, from the protests to surviving the pandemic, to being best friends in business together and collecting that coin, babes it’s a wrap! Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices

item.title: Going Nowhere Fast
item.description: The year end is near and so is a vaccine. The guys get nostalgic for trips, travel, the top places they’ve been, and fantasize about where they’ll go next. Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices

item.title: Our Favorite Things!
item.description: It's gift giving season and a la the queen herself, Oprah, Rickey and Denzel rundown a few of their favorite things and reflect on memorable presents and gifts of Christmases past.  Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices

item.title: Babes, We Got COVID
item.description: Can't brunch, can't party, and can't lie: COVID caught Rickey and Denzel. But, recovered and ready, they're here with hot takes on the "pannie" of the century. Yep, it's a new week, but same old pandemic. Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices

item.title: Adulting
item.description: This week, Rickey and Denzel get really real about the highs and lows of adulting and drop all the gems you need about credit, debt, bills, taxes, working for yourself and living independently and confidently. Listen in and level up! Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices

item.title: A Cute Thanksgiving
item.description: Candied yams, turkey, fufu and jollof--the guys have hot takes about food this holiday season; somehow neither of them are cooking, but go off... This week it’s personal: family traditions, fun memories of festive seasons past, and how to have a cute Thanksgiving 2020. Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices

item.title: Are We Compatible?
item.description: Today, it’s all things astrology! Thoughtful, charismatic, passionate, and original, Rickey, like Oprah, is SUCH an Aquarius. Practical, ambitious, dependable and blunt AF, Denzel, like Gail, is DEFINITELY a Capricorn. This episode was written in the stars!    Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices

item.title: Fast Fashion
item.description: What is it? Do we need it? Is it worth it? From Walmart jeans to high-end shoes, accessories and the infamous Birkin bag, Rickey and Denzel spend quality time talking about quality fashion, their favorite designers and Denzel’s go-to app for shopping the deals!  Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices

item.title: Grown People Sex
item.description: Today, it’s on with Rickey and Denzel! The guys talk all things sex including turn ons and turn offs, pros and cons of random hookups, and best and worst sexual experiences, including the one that was SO BAD Rickey had to lie, lie, lie his way out of it. Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices

item.title: Are You The Fake Friend?
item.description: If you are, Rickey ain’t talking to you and Denzel ain’t either. This week, the guys talk about the best friendships and worst friendships, organic friends and "clout chasers," real deal friends and fake, lying-ass-bitches!  Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices

item.title: Cute to Be Black
item.description: The boys are back and unapologetically Black, Black, Black, Black! This week, Rickey and Denzel discuss the complexities of being a “Black creator,” (BTW - ever heard anyone say “white creator” or “white influencer?”) and how they really feel about the coded descriptor, “urban.” Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices

item.title: Situationships
item.description: Denzel shares a tale from his love life. And Rickey has a fresh new romance in his life. Will he make it official on today’s podcast?  Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices

item.title: Young and Hungry
item.description: Have you ever hit rock bottom? Ever had a cute $70 or so left in your bank account? Have you ever been so broke you paid for a Happy Meal with loose change? This week, Rickey and Denzel share failures that got them where they are today. Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices

item.title: Rickey Got Scammed!
item.description: And it happened when a crush baited him down an OnlyFans rabbit hole! For our poppin' debut episode, it's all about OnlyFans. Who are Rickey and Denzel subscribed to? How much do they spend on it? Why do they love it and hate it?  Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices

item.title: We Said What We Said Official Trailer
item.description: Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
